Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Letisia
Reviews.Content: I use this for personal and business use.  It's convenient, easy to use and the internet works great on this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Seller Deserves an Award !
Reviews.Author: AgentChin
Reviews.Content: A lot of us are behind the Dell brand so I would just like to say what a great Seller this was to deal with.  The near pristine computer was sent in just a couple of days in a one rate box.  All of the accessories were included.  This was just a fantastic item with a truly fair price.  I have a lot of admiration for a Seller who can pull off the deal, and hit all the bases.  Thank you to a 5 STAR Seller!  This computer is slim but very sturdy, fast, and easy to see.  The tracking works great and the XP Pro is exactly what I was looking for.  The D400 is wifi.  I'm so glad I found this Dell!
